biotools.summary: FUSTA is a FUSE-based virtual filesystem mirroring a (multi)FASTA file as a hierarchy of individual virtual files, simplifying efficient data extraction and bulk/automated processing of FASTA files.

bioschemas.name: FUSTA
bioschemas.summary: FUSTA is a FUSE-based virtual filesystem mirroring a (multi)FASTA file as a hierarchy of individual virtual files, simplifying efficient data extraction and bulk/automated processing of FASTA files.
